message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.Optimization, cs.NA. 

The paper deals with the problem of online prediction with expert advice, which is a classic machine learning problem. It uses verification arguments from optimal control theory and partial differential equations to find better lower and upper bounds on the value of the game. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including cs.IT (Information Theory), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.SY (Systems and Control), cs.Optimization (Optimization and Control), and cs.NA (Numerical Analysis). Among these, cs.IT and cs.LG seem to be the most likely categories, as the paper deals with the problem of prediction and uses machine learning techniques to find better bounds. The other categories are also relevant, as the paper uses optimal control theory and partial differential equations to solve the problem.
